The Atlanta Hawks ( 46 - 12 ) defeated the Orlando Magic ( 19 - 41 ) 95 - 88 on Wednesday at Philips Arena in Atlanta . The Hawks got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Magic 28 - 16 in the first quarter alone . The Hawks were the superior shooters in this one , going 44 percent from the field and 45 percent from the three - point line , while the Magic went 45 percent from the floor and just 35 percent from beyond the arc . The Magic were led by Nikola Vucevic , who came off the bench to score 21 points ( 10 - 16 FG , 1 - 2 FT ) , while also adding 15 rebounds and one blocked shot . It was his second double - double in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 34 points and 9 rebounds per game . Al Horford also had a solid showing , posting 17 points ( 7 - 9 FG , 3 - 4 FT ) , 13 rebounds and four steals . It was his first double - double of the season , and he 's now averaging 17 points and 3 rebounds on the season . DeMarre Carroll had a strong showing as well , finishing with 15 points ( 6 - 12 FG , 3 - 6 3Pt ) , eight rebounds and three steals . It was a new season - high in points for him , so it was good to see him get back on track . Coming off the bench , Channing Frye had 10 points ( 3 - 10 FG , 3 - 8 3Pt , 1 - 1 FT ) in 24 minutes . The Hawks ' next game will be at home against the Miami Heat on Wednesday , while the Magic will travel to Miami to play the Heat on Friday .

Kyrie Irving led the way for the Hawks ( 34 - 18 ) with a career - high 43 points on 14 - of - 21 shooting , to go along with nine assists , two rebounds and four steals . LeBron James finished with 38 points , 13 rebounds and eight assists , while Kyrie Irving added 43 points , nine assists and two rebounds . Dennis Schroder was the only other Hawks player in double figures , scoring 17 points on 7 - of - 15 shooting in 32 minutes off the bench . The Hawks were led by Tim Hardaway Jr. , who finished with 36 points on 13 - of - 20 shooting , including 5 - of - 9 from long range . Paul Millsap added 27 points , nine rebounds and one assist , while Dwight Howard added 15 points , 10 rebounds , two steals and one block , in 27 minutes . Kent Frye was the high - point man for the Hawks , with 14 points on 5 - of - 12 shooting , along with four rebounds , in 35 minutes . The Hawks shot 54 percent from the field and 39 percent from long range , as they gave up 12 turnovers as a team . Tim Hardaway Jr. led the way for the Hawks , with 36 points on 13 - of - 20 shooting , including 5 - of - 9 from long range . Paul Millsap followed up with 27 points , nine rebounds and one assist , in 37 minutes . Kent Bazemore chipped in 14 points , while Ersan Ilyasova and Ersan Ilyasova finished with 10 points and 10 points . The Cavaliers will look to get back on track as they play host to the Mavericks on Saturday . The Hawks will look to bounce back as they play host to the Nets on Saturday .

As a team , Golden State shot 47 percent from the field and 35 percent from deep in the second half as well .

DeMarcus Cousins led the way for the Rockets ( 41 - 35 ) with a game - high 27 points on 11 - of - 19 shooting , to go along with 13 rebounds , five assists , four steals and four blocks in 35 minutes . Lou Williams ( 9 - 16 FG , 7 - 11 3Pt ) and Eric Gordon ( 5 - 16 FG , 5 - 14 3PT ) led the Rockets with 19 points apiece . The Pelicans ( 23 - 18 ) were led by DeMarcus Cousins , who finished with 27 points ( 11 - 19 FG , 4 - 5 FT ) and 13 rebounds , along with five assists , five steals , four blocks and five steals , in 35 minutes . Clint Capela added 15 points and eight rebounds , while Clint Capela chipped in 15 points to go along with eight rebounds . Jrue Holiday struggled from the field ( 3 - 12 FG ) and finished with six points on 3 - of - 12 shooting . Next up , the Pelicans play the second game of a back - to - back when they visit the Houston Rockets on Friday , while the Pelicans visit the Dallas Mavericks on Friday .

Paul George led the way for Indiana , as he tallied 39 points , four rebounds , one assist and two steals , while Jordan Clarkson added 22 points on 8 - of - 15 shooting . Kobe Bryant finished with 13 points on 4 - of - 20 shooting , including a perfect 3 - of - 7 from behind the arc . Paul finished with a game - high 39 points on 10 - of - 22 shooting , including 5 - of - 11 from long range , 14 - of - 17 from the foul line , but it was good to see him get back on track as a team on the offensive end . Nick Young scored 22 points in 28 minutes off the bench and finished with 22 points . Up next , the Pacers will head home Wednesday to take on the 76ers , while the Lakers will head home Friday to play the Nuggets . The Lakers will look to bounce back when they visit the New Orleans Pelicans ( 27 - 33 ) on Tuesday . The Lakers have been eliminated from playoff contention , but they did n't have the same sort of success from long range . They were led by Jordan Clarkson , who scored a team - high 22 points on 8 - of - 15 shooting and grabbed 10 rebounds in 39 minutes .

The recent form of these teams would have indicated a different result , but the Grizzlies were able to prevail with a huge win . The second half is where the Grizzlies really turned it on , as they outscored the Raptors by 22 in the second quarter . The assist - to - turnover ratio was the difference in the game , with the Raptors recording 16 assists to 14 turnovers , while the Raptors committed 18 turnovers to just 16 assists . The Raptors were led by DeMar DeRozan , who tallied 27 points , six rebounds , four assists and one steal in the win . Zach Randolph was the only other starter in double figures , as he totaled 16 points and 4 rebounds . Norman Powell was huge off the bench , providing 14 points , four rebounds , five assists and two steals . On deck for the Raptors is a road matchup against the New Orleans Pelicans on Saturday . The Grizzlies ( 41 - 41 ) have now won three - straight games , as they continue to climb up the Eastern Conference ladder . Kyle Lowry led the way , as he tallied 22 points , three rebounds and two assists on 7 - of - 17 shooting . Kyle Lowry was second on the team , finishing with 22 points , three assists , three rebounds and one steal . Jonas Valanciunas recorded a double - double , totaling 11 points , 14 rebounds and three steals . Norman Powell was the only other player with more than 10 points , as he provided 14 points , four rebounds , five assists and two steals off the bench . On deck for Toronto is a home matchup against the Los Angeles Clippers on Friday .

The Toronto Raptors ( 2 - 0 ) defeated the Boston Celtics ( 1 - 1 ) 113 - 103 on Wednesday at the TD Garden in Boston . The Raptors got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Celtics 26 - 26 in the first quarter alone . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 28 points and 21 rebounds over his last two games . The Celtics ( 26 - 15 ) learned earlier in the day that they 'd have to drop their second game in a row , as they 'd now won five of their last six games , including a two - game win streak to a home win . Isaiah Thomas led the way for Boston , as he dropped a game - high 35 points on 14 - of - 25 shooting , including 7 - of - 15 from long range , along with five assists and five rebounds , in 31 minutes . Al Horford added 22 points , six rebounds and four assists , while Jae Crowder chipped in 15 points , seven rebounds , three assists and one steal , in 30 minutes . Meanwhile , the Hornets ( 20 - 21 ) were led by Kemba Walker , who finished with 24 points , four assists and five rebounds in 31 minutes . Marvin Williams added 21 points of his own , while Nicolas Batum added 15 points , three rebounds , three assists , one steal and two blocks . Kelly Olynyk chipped in 15 points on 6 - of - 9 shooting , including 2 - of - 2 from long range , and nine rebounds , in 26 minutes off the bench . The Hornets will look to keep things rolling , as they host the Timberwolves on Saturday . The Celtics ( 20 - 15 ) have now won three of their last four games , as they continue to climb back into the playoff hunt . Kemba Walker led the way for Boston , as he dropped 24 points on 8 - of - 25 shooting , including 7 - of - 15 from long range , along with five rebounds and four assists , in 31 minutes . Al Horford finished with 22 points , six rebounds and four assists , in 34 minutes . Kelly Olynyk chipped in 15 points on 6 - of - 9 shooting , nine rebounds , four assists and one steal , in 26 minutes off the bench . The Hornets will look to keep things rolling , as they host the Timberwolves on Saturday .

The Nets got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Knicks 27 - 18 in the first quarter alone . The Nets were able to get the lead going into the fourth quarter , but the Nets were able to coast to a victory in front of their home crowd . The Nets shot 43 percent from the field and 35 percent from the three - point line , while the Knicks went 43 percent from the floor and just 39 percent from beyond the arc . The Knicks were led by Joe Johnson , who scored 22 points ( 7 - 14 FG , 1 - 4 3Pt , 7 - 7 FT ) , to go along with eight rebounds , six assists , three steals and one block . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's averaging 37 points and 7 rebounds over his last three games . Deron Williams also had a solid showing as well , finishing with 19 points ( 6 - 12 FG , 5 - 8 3Pt , 2 - 3 FT ) , five rebounds and five assists . He 's now averaging 22 points and 7 rebounds on the year . The Nets ' next game will be on the road against the Detroit Pistons on Wednesday , while the Knicks will be at home against the Detroit Pistons in Madison Square Garden on Wednesday .

The Bucks responded with a run of star point guard Khris Middleton , who missed the game - winning three - pointer with less than a second left in regulation . Khris Middleton missed a three - point attempt with 10 seconds left to seal the victory . The Thunder were led by Kevin Durant , who scored a game - high 33 points , to go along with 12 rebounds , three assists , one steal and one block on 11 - of - 18 shooting . Enes Kanter was the only other Rockets player to score in double - figures , scoring 22 points on 9 - of - 16 shooting in 26 minutes . Corey Brewer ( 16 ) , Clint Capela ( 12 ) and Clint Capela ( 10 ) round out the Thunder players in double figures , while J.R. Smith ( 10 points ) and Josh Smith ( 10 points on 4 - of - 9 shooting ) were huge off the bench . James Harden led the way for the Thunder , with 33 points on 8 - of - 22 shooting from the field and 2 - of - 7 from long range , along with seven rebounds , seven assists , two steals and one block , in 39 minutes . Enes Kanter added 22 points ( 9 - 16 FG , 4 - 4 FT ) , 10 rebounds , two assists and two steals , in 26 minutes , while Enes Kanter chipped in 22 points and 10 rebounds , in 26 minutes off the bench . Up next , the Thunder will head home Wednesday to take on the Mavericks , while the Rockets will head home Wednesday to play the Kings .

These are two teams going in opposite directions and this result shows just what the doctor ordered . The key for New Orleans was their rebounding , as they won that battle , 44 - 38 . The Mavericks ( 31 - 43 ) have now won five of their last six games , as they continue to slide down the standings . Harrison Barnes was the only other starter in double figures , as he totaled 19 points , eight rebounds and three assists . The Golden State Warriors ( 54 - 13 ) defeated the Atlanta Hawks ( 53 - 15 ) 114 - 95 on Wednesday at the Oracle Arena in Oakland . The Warriors were the superior shooters in this game , going 52 percent from the field and 47 percent from the three - point line , while the Hawks went just 36 percent from the floor and a meager 36 percent from deep . The Warriors were led by the duo of Stephen Curry and Andre Iguodala . Barnes went 11 - for - 13 from the field and 2 - for - 3 from the three - big line to score a game - high of 25 points , while also adding four rebounds and an assist . He 's now averaging 25 points and 11 rebounds on the year . Stephen Curry also had a strong showing , going just 4 - for - 11 from the field , but still finished with 16 points ( 4 - 11 FG , 2 - 6 3Pt , 6 - 6 FT ) , four rebounds and 12 assists . It was his second double - double in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 24 points and 11 rebounds . DeMarre Carroll was the only other starter to reach double figures in points , as he went 5 - for - 12 from the field and 3 - for - 6 from the free throw line to score 16 points , to go along with 12 rebounds and two blocked shots . The Warriors ' next game will be on the road against the New Orleans Pelicans on Wednesday , while the Hawks will be at home aganist the Toronto Raptors on Friday .

The Celtics were led by a pair of 29 - point efforts from Isaiah Thomas ( 29 points , four assists , three steals ) and Kristaps Porzingis ( 14 points ) and Marcus Smart ( 19 points , seven rebounds , three assists , three steals and a block ) and Kelly Olynyk ( 19 points , six rebounds , three assists and three steals ) were productive in reserve roles as well . Thomas ' 29 points led the Knicks , a total he supplemented with three assists , three rebounds and a steal . Avery Bradley was next with 15 points , 10 rebounds , two assists and three steals . Kristaps Porzingis posted a 14 - point , 6 - rebound double - double that also included an assist , two blocks and a steal . Kristaps Porzingis supplied 14 points , six boards , an assist , a steal and two blocks . Terry Rozier led the second unit with 10 points , five rebounds , an assist and two steals . Isaiah Thomas 's 29 points paced New York , a total he complemented with four rebounds , four assists and one steal . Kelly Olynyk was next with 19 points , seven boards , three assists and two steals . Kristaps Porzingis registered 14 points , six rebounds , an assist , two blocks and a steal . Derrick Rose was right behind him with 11 points , six assists , four rebounds and three steals . Jaylen Brown led the second unit with 10 points , four rebounds , two assists , two blocks and one block . The Knicks head back home to face off with the Detroit Pistons on Friday night , while the Celtics travel to Detroit to take on the Pistons on Friday evening as well .
